name: PositionedDirectional
info: Same functionality as the Positioned component, but with different property names. It can only be used in a Stack, allowing precise placement of a component by specifying distances from the top, left, right, and bottom.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of PositionedDirectional
desc: 【top】 : Distance to the top of the parent   【double】
【end】 : Distance to the right of the parent   【double】
【start】 : Distance to the left of the parent   【double】
【bottom】 : Distance to the bottom of the parent   【double】
